name: quantum-syntax
description: Quantum is a simple, flat theme for Atom based around the Tomorrow color scheme.
readme: # Quantum UI Syntax Theme Syntax theme for Atom using the ever popular [base16][base16] tomorrow dark colors. Pair it with the [Quantum UI Theme](https://github.com/mbullington/quantum-ui)**. Originally forked from Atom's version of the base16 Tomorrow color scheme. [base16]: https://github.com/chriskempson/base16
